# Set up environment, specify parameters for analysis, and create global objects

```{r set_up}
# load `here` package for easy relative file paths
library(here)

# run set-up
source(here("scripts", "set_up", "01_load_packages.R"))
source(here("scripts", "set_up", "02_set_options_parameters.R"))
source(here("scripts", "set_up", "03_create_directories.R"))
source(here("scripts", "set_up", "04_build_functions.R"))
source(here("scripts", "set_up", "05_build_base_maps.R"))
```

# Import data necessary for analysis

```{r import_clean_data}
# import Watershed Boundary Dataset and National Hydrography Dataset objects
source(here("scripts", "clean_data", "01_import_clean_nhd_wbd.R"))
```
